data: March | Garden | Cevennes | Gard | Rhone | Beaucaire
left bank of the Garden | Cevennes | department of the Gard | Rhone | Beaucaire

Early one morning in the month of March, 1770, a woman bearing in her arms a new-born infant, was hastening along the left bank of the Garden, a small river that rises in the Cevennes, traverses the department of the Gard, and empties into the Rhone, not far from Beaucaire.
